article_title: The Obamacare Excise Tax On Medical Devices

article_metadata.description: The once-dominant U.S. medical device industry has been damaged by a devastating 2.3% excise that tax that is part of ObamaCare. It's past time that the tax was repealed.
article_metadata.author: Henry I. Miller
